qa-2026-02-12-e2e-full-run-remaining-fai.title: Full Chromium E2E run still not green on compose-lite
qa-2026-02-12-e2e-full-run-remaining-fai.details: Run on 2026-02-12 with ANANTA_E2E_USE_EXISTING=1 ended with 27 passed, 4 skipped, 5 failed (`llm-config`, `settings-config`, `sse-events`, `team-types-roles`, `templates-ai`).

qa-2026-02-12-llm-config-save-timeout.title: LLM config save E2E times out waiting for /config POST
qa-2026-02-12-llm-config-save-timeout.details: `tests/llm-config.spec.ts` times out on `waitForResponse(.../config POST...)` in compose-backed runs.

qa-2026-02-12-settings-raw-config-save-t.title: Settings raw config E2E times out waiting for /config POST
qa-2026-02-12-settings-raw-config-save-t.details: `tests/settings-config.spec.ts` times out on raw-config save response wait (`/config` POST 200).

qa-2026-02-12-sse-events-token-refresh.title: SSE event token update not reflected in agent card
qa-2026-02-12-sse-events-token-refresh.details: `tests/sse-events.spec.ts` expects token value `rotated-token-123`, but UI keeps `hubsecret`.

qa-2026-02-12-team-types-roles-template-.title: Team types/roles E2E cannot find newly created template card
qa-2026-02-12-team-types-roles-template-.details: `tests/team-types-roles.spec.ts` fails at template-card assertion after template creation (`toHaveCount(1)` got 0).

qa-2026-02-12-templates-ai-draft-not-pop.title: Templates AI draft generation E2E does not populate form fields
qa-2026-02-12-templates-ai-draft-not-pop.details: `tests/templates-ai.spec.ts` mocked draft response does not result in filled Name/Description/Prompt fields.

qa-2026-02-12-compose-auth-fixture-sqlit.title: Auth fixture-state tests are skipped in compose-backed runs
qa-2026-02-12-compose-auth-fixture-sqlit.details: `auth-lockout`, `auth-rate-limit`, and `auth-password` now skip when `ANANTA_E2E_USE_EXISTING=1` because they depend on sqlite DB mutation helpers not applicable to postgres compose setup.

qa-2026-02-12-compose-lite-postgres-loca.title: Compose-lite postgres logs report missing locale binary
qa-2026-02-12-compose-lite-postgres-loca.details: Postgres init logs include `sh: locale: not found` and `no usable system locales were found`; service remains healthy.

qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.title: Redis vm.overcommit_memory host warning
qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.details: Hub/worker logs still warn about host kernel setting `vm.overcommit_memory=0`; non-blocking for current E2E run.
